# Ye Zheng - Marketing Portfolio
> Digital Marketing Strategist with 5+ years managing 120+ client accounts across B2B industrial, CPG/FMCG, eCommerce, and AI/SaaS sectors. Specializes in paid ads strategy, marketing project management, and cross-industry performance marketing.

- Website: https://yezhengmarketing.com

- Managed campaigns achieving 82% ROAS improvement and 313% conversion value increases
- Orchestrated investor events with 44% attendance rates
- Cross-industry expertise: applying FMCG insights to B2B contexts and vice versa
